room_title: Escape room "Dr. Ensaine" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
review: So much fun!! We did Dr. Ensain and it didn’t disappoint. They did a fantastic job on the room and every little detail. Staff was so friendly the whole time and patient with us when we got stuck. Can’t wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Ensaine" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
review: We did the Dr. Ensaine room yesterday this was the first escape room for all of us 4. We loved it! We will be back to do the others for sure. We got out 3 mins over the time limit :( but was very fun.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Ensaine" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
review: Brought my daughter and her friends to the Dr. Ensaine for her 13th birthday. Staff were very helpful and we loved the challenge (we escaped!). Now to hit the other three!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Ensaine" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
review: We went to do the Dr. Ensaine room and it was the first time in an escape room for some of us. We were celebrating my daughter Alora's 13th birthday with her 5 friends. Megan was our clue giver. She was so patient with us. The room was awesome. The girls screamed so much that it was scaring other customers and was entertaining the staff. We finished the room with 3 seconds to spare! Can't wait to do another room!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Ensaine" by Key and Code Escape Rooms in Reno
review: Been to all the escape rooms in Reno and have done three rooms at this place already and we absolutely love them! It’s family owned and operated and the owners are wonderful people. The rooms are so realistic, the puzzles are difficult but not impossible and the intensity is real. Highly recommend Dr. Ensaine, the scare factor is heart bounding and the room-scene-environment is sooo well done!
